hostnameConfigurations.description: Gets or sets custom hostname configuration of the Api Management service.

additionalLocations.description: Gets or sets additional datacenter locations description of the Api Management service.

customProperties.description: Gets or sets custom properties of the Api Management service.

vpnType.description: Gets or sets virtual private network type of the Api Management service.

message.description: Gets or sets the message, which provides the resource naming requirements in case the reason is Invalid.

reason.description: Gets or sets the reason when isAvailable is false.

oAuth2.description: Gets or sets OAuth Authentication Settings.

header.description: Gets or sets Subscription key header name.

query.description: Gets or sets Subscription key query string parameter name.

id.description: Gets or sets API identifier path: /apis/{aid}

name.description: Gets or sets API name. Must be 1 to 300 characters long.

serviceUrl.description: Gets or sets Base address for API requests. Must be 1 to 2000 characters long.

path.description: Gets or sets Path for API requests. Must be 1 to 400 characters long.

protocols.description: Gets or sets Protocols over which API is made available.

authenticationSettings.description: Gets or sets Collection of authentication settings included into this API.

subscriptionKeyParameterNames.description: Gets or sets Protocols over which API is made available.

count.description: Gets or sets total records count number.

content.description: Gets or sets response content bytes.

name.description: Gets or sets Parameter name.

defaultValue.description: Gets or sets Default parameter value.

required.description: Gets or sets whether parameter is required or not.

description.description: Gets or sets Operation request description.

queryParameters.description: Gets or sets Collection of operation request query parameters.

headers.description: Gets or sets Collection of operation request headers.

representations.description: Gets or sets Collection of operation request representations.

statusCode.description: Gets or sets Operation response status code.

description.description: Gets or sets Operation response description.

representations.description: Gets or sets Collection of operation response representations.

name.description: Gets or sets Operation Name. Must be 1 to 300 characters long.

method.description: Gets or sets Operation Method (GET, PUT, POST, etc.).

urlTemplate.description: Gets or sets Operation URI template. Cannot be more than 400 characters long.

templateParameters.description: Gets or sets Collection of URL template parameters.

responses.description: Gets or sets Array of Operation responses.

OperationCreateOrUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate Operation operation.

id.description: Gets or sets Product identifier path.

name.description: Gets or sets Product name. Must be 1 to 300 characters long.

description.description: Gets or sets Product description. May be 1 to 500 characters long.

terms.description: Gets or sets Product terms and conditions. Developer will have to accept these terms before he's allowed to call product API.

subscriptionRequired.description: Gets or sets whether a product subscription is required for accessing APIs included in this product. If true, the product is referred to as "protected" and a valid subscription key is required for a request to an API included in the product to succeed. If false, the product is referred to as "open" and requests to an API included in the product can be made without a subscription key. If property is omitted when creating a new product it's value is assumed to be true.

approvalRequired.description: Gets or sets whether subscription approval is required. Iffalse, new subscriptions will be approved automatically enabling developers to call the products APIs immediately after subscribing. Iftrue, administrators must manually approve the subscription before the developer can any of the products APIs. Can be present only if subscriptionRequired property is present and has a value of false.

subscriptionsLimit.description: Gets or sets whether the number of subscriptions a user can have to this product at the same time. Set tonullor omit to allow unlimited per user subscriptions. Can be present only if subscriptionRequired property is present and has a value of false.

state.description: Gets or sets whether product is published or not. Published products are discoverable by users of developer portal. Non published products are visible only to administrators.

count.description: Gets or sets total records count number.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets next page link if any.

id.description: Gets or sets Subscription identifier path.

userId.description: Gets or sets Subscriber identifier path.

productId.description: Gets or sets Product identifier path.

name.description: Gets or sets Subscription name.

createdDate.description: Gets or sets Subscription creation date.

startDate.description: Gets or sets Subscription activation date.

expirationDate.description: Gets or sets Subscription expiration date.

endDate.description: Gets or sets Date when subscription was cancelled or expired.

notificationDate.description: Gets or sets Upcoming subscription expiration notification date.

primaryKey.description: Gets or sets Subscription primary key.

secondaryKey.description: Gets or sets Subscription secondary key.

stateComment.description: Gets or sets Subscription State Comment.

count.description: Gets or sets total records count number.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets next page link if any.

userId.description: Gets or sets User (user id path) for whom subscription is being created.

productId.description: Gets or sets Product (product id path) for which subscription is being created.

name.description: Gets or sets Subscription name.

primaryKey.description: Gets or sets Primary subscription key. If not specified during request key will be generated automatically. Must be 1 to 256 characters long.

secondaryKey.description: Gets or sets Secondary subscription key. If not specified during request key will be generated automatically. Must be 1 to 256 characters long.

state.description: Gets or sets Initial subscription state.

subscriptionRequired.description: Gets or sets whether a product subscription is required for accessing APIs included in this product. If true, the product is referred to as "protected" and a valid subscription key is required for a request to an API included in the product to succeed. If false, the product is referred to as "open" and requests to an API included in the product can be made without a subscription key. If property is omitted when creating a new product it's value is assumed to be true.

approvalRequired.description: Gets or sets whether subscription approval is required. Iffalse, new subscriptions will be approved automatically enabling developers to call the products APIs immediately after subscribing. Iftrue, administrators must manually approve the subscription before the developer can any of the products APIs. Can be present only if subscriptionRequired property is present and has a value of false.

subscriptionsLimit.description: Gets or sets whether the number of subscriptions a user can have to this product at the same time. Set tonullor omit to allow unlimited per user subscriptions. Can be present only if subscriptionRequired property is present and has a value of false.

state.description: Gets or sets whether product is published or not. Published products are discoverable by users of developer portal. Non published products are visible only to administrators.

code.description: Gets or sets Property level error code.

message.description: Gets or sets Human-readable representation of property-level error.

code.description: Gets or sets Service-defined error code. This code serves as a sub-status for the HTTP error code specified in the response.

details.description: Gets or sets the list of invalid fields send in request, in case of validation error.

id.description: Gets or sets Operation result identifier.

status.description: Gets or sets Status of an async operation.

started.description: Gets or sets Start time of an async operation.

updated.description: Gets or sets Last update time of an async operation.

commitId.description: Gets or sets the latest commit Id.

isExport.description: Gets or sets value indicating if last sync was save (true) or deploy (false) operation.

isSynced.description: Gets or sets value indicating if last synchronization was later than the configuration change.

isGitEnabled.description: Gets or sets value indicating whether Git configuration access is enabled.

syncDate.description: Gets or sets the date of the latest synchronization, in ISO 8601 format.

configurationChangeDate.description: Gets or sets the date of the latest configuration change, in ISO 8601 format.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
